mapper.insert: INSERT INTO album_mood_vote (id, user_id, album_id, mood) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{albumId}, #{mood})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, album_id, mood FROM album_mood_vote ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, user_id, album_id, mood FROM album_mood_vote WHERE album_id = #{albumId}

SELECT v.album_id, a.title AS album_title, t.name AS mood_name, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM album_mood_vote v JOIN album a ON v.album_id = a.id JOIN tag t ON v.mood = t.id GROUP BY v.album_id, a.title, t.name ORDER BY v.album_id, vote_count DESC
